name: Way Lake
overview: Way Lake, a bouldering area in the United States, features impressive granite formations that provide challenging climbs and beautiful natural scenery. Its reputation is built on the quality of granite rock and stunning lakeside views. Way Lake is most popular during the milder seasons when climbers can fully enjoy this picturesque location.
